dek: Seven destinations by design: With the holiday season upon us, we asked a group of top architects and designers to tell us how they travel and shop, what they buy and why.
seoDescription: Seven destinations by design: With the holiday season upon us, we asked a group of top architects and designers to tell us how they travel and shop, what they buy and why.
socialDescription: Seven destinations by design: With the holiday season upon us, we asked a group of top architects and designers to tell us how they travel and shop, what they buy and why.
body:
## Pierre Yovanovitch





__Restaurants__



 __Chez Josephine-Dumonet__ has delicious meat and game, and an exceptional mille-feuille.



__Hotels__



 The view from the top floor of __Le Meurice__ allows guests to discover all of Paris.



__Shopping__



 Karl Lagerfeld's bookshop, __7L__, is dedicated to art, photography and fashion.



__Leisure__



 I like to have a cup of tea at the __Hôtel Montalembert__ on Sunday afternoons. It's very calm and quiet. In the winter, there is a fire in the fireplace, just like in a cozy and welcoming house.



__Outdoors__



 The __Cour Carrée of the Louvre at night__ is amazing.



__Tradition__



 It's a bad habit, but a few weeks __before a presidential election, we collect parking tickets__ in the hopes that they will be canceled.





## Craig Wright





__Restaurants__



 __Le Voltaire__ is where all of the grand antiques dealers go and the people in the art world. It's a real yoo-hoo kind of place. The *pommes frites* are the best in all of Paris, and everybody knows it.



__Hotels__



 The __Hôtel Montalembert__ is old and new Paris.



__Shopping__



 __Galerie Jean-Jacques Dutko__ carries the bronze work of Bruno Romeda.



__Leisure__



 __La Pagode__ is the French version of Grauman's Chinese as Napoléon III would have built it.



__Outdoors__



 __Le Parc des Buttes-Chaumont__ is a 19th-century gem.



__Tradition__



 We rent a little rowboat and have a __picnic on the lake__ in the __Bois de Boulogne__.





## Juan Pablo Molyneux





__Restaurants__



 I really like the Parisian ambience at __Benoit__.__Le Voltaire__ is another favorite.



__Hotels__



 __L'Hôtel__ is a Neoclassical design by Jacques Garcia.



__Shopping__



 At __Atelier Prométhée__, they sell reeditions of terra-cotta busts, planters and fountains from the 17th, 18th and 19th centuries.



__Leisure__



 I unwind at my __place in the country at__ the Château du Marais.



__Outdoors__



 At the __Tuileries terraces__, you can see almost all of Paris.



__Tradition__



 We __read the newspaper on a café terrace__ with a café crème and a *tartine au beurre* (baguette with butter). After that, we go antiques shopping.
